item.title: Former 911 Responder Shares Horror Stories Of Mail-Order Abortions

item.title: NASCAR Ditches Cheap Gimmicks In Favor Of A Playoff Format Focused On Racing
item.description: Most motorsports fans will find something to like in a 'new' format that echoes one from two decades ago.

item.title: Don’t Wait Until You Die To Give Your Kids Their Inheritance
item.description: A dollar at 25 can change a destiny. A dollar at 55 barely moves the needle.

item.description: A proposed 50 percent royalty seizure would be a death knell for our system of academic technology transfer.

item.description: An early-detection blood test, if covered by Medicare, could save money and lives.

item.description: After several years of a U.S. in retreat, the Monroe Doctrine is experiencing a resurgence.
